channel.title: [New Question Inside] Help I'm new with this bluurrs client thing
channel.description:
I just got a Bluurrs client and the client works and all but when I log into my server, or at least should I say, try to log in it logs in for one second then it logs back out. But it doesn't even do a complete log in. I wonder if there's some sort of code i need to add to my server source to make it work... It's as you all might have guessed a DeltaScape Server. I just wanted to see a new gameframe because I got tired of the old DeltaScape client gameframe. Can anyone help?
Thanks! Ghostly150
P.S. Is there a way to make the Bluurrs client load faster... it starts going slow at around "loading maps 83%."
**Fixed this part but please read my newer post in this same thread.

item.title: [New Question Inside] Help I'm new with this bluurrs client thing
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

What!? I don’t know… Anyways I fixed it and I’m able to log in but there’s a few things I need to fix:

1.) When it logs me in it shows that interface with the two heads with both Arrgh or whatever. How do I remove that?

2.) When I try to walk using the minimap, I click the minimap and it freezes the client. Where should I find the code to fix this?

3.) The common character glitch where the character, I don’t know how to describe this but, sort or bobbles his head and depending on what I’m wearing does the bending over glitch thing.

If I find anymore I’ll try to fix but these are the main ones that need fixing.

P.S. Is there a way to make the Bluurrs client load faster... it starts going slow at around "loading maps 83%."

Read full topic
item.source: [New Question Inside] Help I'm new with this bluurrs client thing

item.title: [New Question Inside] Help I'm new with this bluurrs client thing
item.dc:creator: @Dealt Dealt
item.description:
@Dealt wrote:

  1. Open PlayerHandler.java and find this line

if(players[i].playerName.startsWith("424242222")) players[i].playerRights = 4;

  1. Delete it.

Read full topic
item.source: [New Question Inside] Help I'm new with this bluurrs client thing
